snippet: Lofty ticket prices keep the most desirable Broadway shows out of the general public’s reach.
abstract: Editorial notes record box-office gross for Broadway revival of Harold Pinter's Betrayal does not reflect play's popularity so much as astronomical ticket prices, which averaged $150.87; holds  high cost of recruiting Hollywood stars puts such blockbuster productions out of reach for the general public.
lead_paragraph: Lofty ticket prices keep the most desirable Broadway shows out of the general public’s reach.
